name: A.P. #706 – the object
description: A weightless form, which unfurls freely in the space and fluidly transforms into geometric or amorphous entities. A rotating animation still of the interactive audiovisual installation „Anima Perplexa“. Created with Max MSP Jitter. Video mov, h.264, 1920x1080, 27 sec.  By Michel Winterberg from 2021. https://michelwinterberg.ch
